directions: Mix black-eyed peas, onion, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, green bell pepper, canola oil, ketchup, vinegar, jalapeno peppers, garlic, oregano, cumin, salt, basil, chili powder, paprika, celery salt, black pepper, and thyme together in a large bowl. together in a large bowl.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate to let the flavors mingle, at least 1 hour.
ingredients: 4 (15 ounce) cans black-eyed peas, rinsed and drained
title: Texas Caviar
